Licence Market stall licence

Apply for a market stall licence
from London Borough of Barnet

Step 1 of 4
  1. Complete application
  2. Submit application
  3. Pay fee
  4. Done

2. Submit the application documents

Application form

Please attach the completed application form below.

Supporting documents

All documents are required, unless stated otherwise. Photos of documents are acceptable, as long as all the relevant information is clear. We'll only share these documents with the licencing authority.

What if I can't submit all of these documents?

You don't have to submit optional documents, but it may improve your chances of a successful application if you do.

If you can't submit the documents digitally you can send copies by post instead. We'll give you the address and reference number to quote once you've paid the licence fee.

OK, I'll submit all the documents by post instead

Continue to pay fee
